My Name

Typically, my social media username is @lorderikir with the exception of LinkedIn being ericjiang97 The origin of this name comes from Eric is a Norse name which was derived from Eríkr or Erikir which meant 'king' or 'ruler', or could be 'lord'. so it sort of meant Lord Lord/King/Ruler which is meant to be a pun!

Hi, I'm Eric and I'm a 3rd Year BInfoTech Student @ Monash Uni. I really love development in general as well and am very passionate about DevOps, and the security, service delivery, cloud computing and maintainability of any project.
